title: Women must use technology to bring gender parity at the workplace, say women tech leaders - Times of India
content: Women must use technology to bring gender parity at the workplace, say women tech leaders  Times of India
description: India Business News: Omnichannel jewellery retailer Bluestone has raised over $30 million (about Rs 228 crore) in a funding round led by Sunil Kant Munjal, chairman of Her
